fields.label: Prompt / Instructions
fields.description: For AI Query: the prompt. For Data Query: filters as JSON. For Email: subject line. Use {{prev_result}} to reference previous step output.

fields.label: Target DocType
fields.description: For Data Query, Create/Update Document steps

fields.label: Filters / Data (JSON)
fields.description: JSON filters for data query, or field values for create/update

fields.label: Model Override
fields.description: Override the default model for this step

fields.label: Output Variable
fields.description: Name to reference this step's output in later steps, e.g. 'step1_result'
